Symbol.Script_3D:
reqBKnobs = 0 success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("LibraryGlobals13", "hideBKnobs", reqBKnobs) if success > 0 and reqBKnobs then end endif
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m=0 THEN END
MATERIAL gs_latch_mat rotx 90
!!! ************************Style 1************************************ IF gs_latch_typ_m = 1 THEN IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN !!!Detailed !!!frame prism_ 8, th1, -aa1/2, -bb1/2, 11, aa1/2, -bb1/2, 11, aa1/2, -rnh/2, 13, aa1/2, rnh/2, 9, aa1/2, bb1/2, 11, -aa1/2, bb1/2, 11, -aa1/2, rnh/2, 13, -aa1/2, -rnh/2, 9
CUTPOLY 4, -aa1/2+0.005, lth, -aa1/2+0.005, -lth, aa1/2-0.005, -lth, aa1/2-0.005, lth
ADD aa1/2, 0, th1 ROTy -90 prism_ 12, aa1, 0, -bb1/2, 10, 0, -rnh/2, 15, th1, -rkh/2, 15, th1, rkh/2, 15, 0, rnh/2, 10, 0, bb1/2, 13, th1, bb1/2, 15, th1, rnh/2+(th1/tan(bet1)), 15, 2*th1, rkh/2+(th1/tan(bet1)), 15, 2*th1, -rkh/2-(th1/tan(bet1)), 15, th1, -rnh/2-(th1/tan(bet1)), 15, th1, -bb1/2, 15 DEL 2 CUTEND
!!latch ADDz th1 prism 4, th1-0.0003, -aa1/2-0.01, rkh/2-0.001, -aa1/2-0.01, -rkh/2+0.001, aa1/2, -rkh/2+0.001, aa1/2, rkh/2-0.001
RESOL 8 ADD -aa1/2+0.012,0,2*th1 cylind clh, clr DEL 2
ELSE !!!Simple ADDx aa1/2 ROTy -90
Prism 8, aa1, 0, -bb1/2, 0, bb1/2, 2*th1, bb1/2, 2*th1, rnh/2, 3*th1, rkh/2, 3*th1, -rkh/2, 2*th1, -rnh/2, 2*th1, -bb1/2
ADDz aa1 Prism 4, 0.01, th1, rkh/2-0.001, 2*th1, rkh/2-0.001, 2*th1, -rkh/2+0.001, th1, -rkh/2+0.001 DEL 3
ADD -aa1/2+0.012,0,3*th1 cylind clh, clr DEL 1 ENDIF
GOSUB 100 !!!Display
ENDIF
!!! ************************Style 2************************************ IF gs_latch_typ_m = 2 THEN !!! handle ROTx -90
ADDZ -0.0015 Prism_ 14, 0.003, -0.003, -th21-th22, 79, -0.003, -0.012, 79, -0.02, -0.014, 79, -0.022, -0.016, 79, -0.022, -0.017, 79, -0.02, -0.019, 79, -0.003, -0.021, 79,
0.003, -0.021, 79, 0.02, -0.019, 79, 0.022, -0.017, 79, 0.022, -0.016, 79, 0.02, -0.014, 79, 0.003, -0.012, 79, 0.003, -th21-th22, 79
DEL 2
GOSUB 200 !!!base
ADDz -gs_door_thck-dpd ROTy 180 GOSUB 250 DEL 2 ENDIF
!!! ************************Style 3************************************ IF gs_latch_typ_m = 3 THEN IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN resol 28 ELSE resol 18 ENDIF
!!! handle ROTx -90
ADDZ -0.0015 Prism_ 7, 0.003, -0.002, -th21-th22, 79, -0.002, -th21-th22-0.001, 79, 0, 0.003, 979, -diami/2, -th21-th22-0.001, 79, diami/2, -th21-th22-0.001, 3079, 0.002, -th21-th22-0.001, 79, 0.002, -th21-th22, 79 DEL 2
GOSUB 200 !!!base
ADDz -gs_door_thck-dpd ROTy 180 GOSUB 250 DEL 2 ENDIF
!!! ************************Style 4************************************ IF gs_latch_typ_m = 4 THEN
!!! handle ROTx -90
ROTz -90 ROTx -90 ADDZ -0.0015
Prism_ 10, 0.003, th21+th22, 0.003, 79, th21+th22+0.002, 0.003, 79, th21+th22+0.002, diamo/2+0.024, 79, th21+th22+0.004, diamo/2+0.026, 79, th21+th22+0.005, diamo/2+0.026, 79, th21+th22+0.008, 0.028, 79, th21+th22+0.009, 0.01, 79, th21+th22+0.009, -0.002, 79, th21+th22+0.002, -0.003, 79, th21+th22, -0.003, 79 DEL 4
GOSUB 200 !!!base
ADDz -gs_door_thck-dpd ROTy 180 GOSUB 250 DEL 2 ENDIF
END
!!!________________Subroutins___________________________________________ 100: !!! display ADDz -gs_door_thck-dpd Prism_ 4, dpd, -aa1/2, dph/2, 14, aa1/2, dph/2, 14, aa1/2, -dph/2, 14, -aa1/2, -dph/2, 14 ADDz -th1 Prism_ 10, th1, -aa1/2, dph/2, 11, aa1/2, dph/2, 11, aa1/2, -dph/2, 11, -aa1/2, -dph/2, 11, -aa1/2, dph/2, -1, -kjw/2, kjh/2, 15, kjw/2, kjh/2, 15, kjw/2, -kjh/2, 15, -kjw/2, -kjh/2, 15, -kjw/2, kjh/2,-1 DEL 1
MATERIAL "Green1" Poly 4, -kjw/2, kjh/2, kjw/2, kjh/2, kjw/2, -kjh/2, -kjw/2, -kjh/2 RETURN
200: IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN !!!Detailed resol 18 ROTy -90 Revolve 3, 360, 2, 0, diamo/2, 1, th21, diamo/2, 0, th21+th22, diami/2, 1 DEL 1 ELSE !!!Simple resol 10 cylind th21+th22, diamo/2 ENDIF RETURN
250: IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN !!!Detailed resol 18 prism_ 2, th21, 0,0,911+64, diamo/2, 360, 4011+64
Cutpoly 4, dp2w/2, 0.01+dp2h/2, -dp2w/2, 0.01+dp2h/2, -dp2w/2, 0.01-dp2h/2, dp2w/2, 0.01-dp2h/2 ROTy -90 Rotx 90
Revolve 2, 360, 1+2, th21, diamo/2, 1, th21+th22, diami/2, 1 DEL 2 Cutend
MATERIAL "Green1" ADDz th21+0.00001 Poly 4, dp2w/2, 0.01+dp2h/2, -dp2w/2, 0.01+dp2h/2, -dp2w/2, 0.01-dp2h/2, dp2w/2, 0.01-dp2h/2 DEL 1
ELSE !!!Simple resol 10 cylind th21+th22, diamo/2
MATERIAL "Green1" ADDz th21+th22+0.00001 Poly 4, dp2w/2, 0.01+dp2h/2, -dp2w/2, 0.01+dp2h/2, -dp2w/2, 0.01-dp2h/2, dp2w/2, 0.01-dp2h/2 DEL 1 ENDIF RETURN
